DOC.brief_summary: All Hepatocellular carcinoma Renal cell carcinoma patient receive molecular target therapy candidate study . No additional treatment intervention conduct except blood sampling limit one time . Blood sample ( 10 cc volume ) collect study participant provide write informed consent form . DNA extract peripheral blood sample use DNA isolation kit .
DOC.brief_title: Genome-wide Association Study Predict Treatment Response Molecular Targeted Therapy Hepatocellular Carcinoma Renal Cell Carcinoma
